name: l4-lp
description: IDE, rule engine and language bindings for L4 (a DSL for business rules)

scripts.build:all: shadow-cljs release ide && shadow-cljs release browser-esm-lib && shadow-cljs release node-lib && shadow-cljs release py-node-lib && bb uber
scripts.install:swipl-deps: swipl -t "pack_install(date_time, [version('0.1.4'), interactive(false), test(false)])" && swipl -t "pack_install(clpBNR, [version('0.11.8'), interactive(false), test(false)])"
scripts.build:swipl-qlfs: cd public/resources/swipl && swipl -t 'qcompile(prelude, [include(user)])' && cd ../../../src/l4_lp_py/swipl/prolog && swipl -t 'qcompile(prelude, [include(user)])' && cd ../../../../../../../
scripts.run:py-eg: cd src/l4_lp_py && poetry run python example_usage.py && cd -
